scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:localtest && npm run clean:test
scripts.test: npm run clean:all && npm run compile:plugins && cd .. && npm run test
scripts.test:gdb: npm run clean:all && npm run compile:plugins && cd .. && npm run test:gdb
scripts.localtest: rm -rf dist && node localtest_config.js && npm run compile:plugins && LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$INIT_CWD/../../../../out/sdk/ohos-sdk/linux/ets/ets1.2/build-tools/ets2panda/lib node $INIT_CWD/../../../../out/sdk/ohos-sdk/linux/ets/ets1.2/build-tools/driver/build-system/dist/entry.js ./demo/localtest/build_config.json
scripts.localtest_decl: rm -rf dist && node localtest_decl_config.js && npm run compile:plugins && LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$INIT_CWD/../../../../out/sdk/ohos-sdk/linux/ets/ets1.2/build-tools/ets2panda/lib node $INIT_CWD/../../../../out/sdk/ohos-sdk/linux/ets/ets1.2/build-tools/driver/build-system/dist/entry.js ./demo/localtest/build_decl_config.json
scripts.localtest_all: npm run localtest_decl && npm run localtest
